General.Name: Woorison F&G Co. Ltd
General.Description: Woorison F&G Co., Ltd. operates as an agricultural and livestock company in South Korea and internationally. The company engages in breeding pigs, cattle, etc. It is also involved in slaughtering and processing cattle and pigs; and operation of biogas plants. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Naju, South Korea.
